formulas.name: CustomerrorMessage
formulas.expression: MID( {!$Flow.FaultMessage}, FIND('FIELD_CUSTOM_VALIDATION_EXCEPTION: ', {!$Flow.FaultMessage}) + LEN('FIELD_CUSTOM_VALIDATION_EXCEPTION: '), FIND('. You can look up ExceptionCode', {!$Flow.FaultMessage}) - FIND('FIELD_CUSTOM_VALIDATION_EXCEPTION: ', {!$Flow.FaultMessage}) - LEN('FIELD_CUSTOM_VALIDATION_EXCEPTION: ') )

formulas.name: varFormulaTreatmentArea
formulas.expression: IF( NOT(ISBLANK({!Emsculpt_Treatment_Areas12})), {!Emsculpt_Treatment_Areas12} & ';', '' ) & IF( NOT(ISBLANK({!Filler_Treatment_areas12})), {!Filler_Treatment_areas12} & ';', '' ) & IF( NOT(ISBLANK({!Fractional_Treatment_Areas12})), {!Fractional_Treatment_Areas12} & ';', '' ) & IF( NOT(ISBLANK({!IPL_Treatment_Area12})), {!IPL_Treatment_Area12} & ';', '' ) & IF( NOT(ISBLANK({!Laser_Hair_Treatment_Areas12})), {!Laser_Hair_Treatment_Areas12} & ';', '' ) & IF( NOT(ISBLANK({!SkinPen_Treatment_Areas12})), {!SkinPen_Treatment_Areas12} & ';', '' ) & IF( NOT(ISBLANK({!Tattoo_Removal_Treatment_Areas12})), {!Tattoo_Removal_Treatment_Areas12} & ';', '' ) & IF( NOT(ISBLANK({!Vanquish_Treatment_Areas12})), {!Vanquish_Treatment_Areas12} & ';', '' ) & IF( NOT(ISBLANK({!Vein_Treatment_Areas})), {!Vein_Treatment_Areas} & ';', '' ) & IF( NOT(ISBLANK({!Injectable_Treatment_Areas})), {!Injectable_Treatment_Areas}, '' )

recordLookups.name: get_Work_Type_Group_Based_on_Location
recordLookups.label: get Work Type Group Based on Location

fields.name: Copy_1_of_ErrorMessage
fields.fieldText: {!CustomerrorMessage}﻿

fields.fieldText: {!CustomerrorMessage}﻿

fields.name: DisplayFXErrror
fields.fieldText: Fractional / Fractional Membership (Not before 10:45 am due to numbing)

fields.name: ErrorMessage
fields.fieldText: {!CustomerrorMessage}﻿

variables.description: Specify a default time zone for Lightning Scheduler appointments.
variables.name: DefaultTimeZone

variables.description: variable to hold values of distance units
variables.name: distanceUnit

variables.description: The ID of the selected Engagement Channel Type.
variables.name: engagementChannelTypeId

variables.description: Specify a comma-separated list of service resource IDs. Depending on the page, these IDs are used to filter work type groups, service territories, or service resources.
variables.name: FilterByResourceIds

variables.description: Specify whether to display ST OH or not
variables.name: hideStOh

variables.description: Stores the API name of the scheduling policy you want to associate with the flow.
variables.name: SchedulingPolicyName
